TypeSignature.Value: public interface ICopyOption : Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable
.class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ICopyOption implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type ICopyOption = interface interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: An object that configures how to copy or move a file.

remarks.para: An object that configures how to copy or move a file.

Objects of this type may be used with the Files#copy(Path,Path,CopyOption[]) Files.copy(Path,Path,CopyOption...), Files#copy(java.io.InputStream,Path,CopyOption[]) Files.copy(InputStream,Path,CopyOption...) and Files#move Files.move(Path,Path,CopyOption...) methods to configure how a file is copied or moved.
The StandardCopyOption enumeration type defines the standard options.
